Reproducable by:
- start eclipse
- create java project with a java file
- set the encoding of the file to be something different than the default
- switch to the resource perspective
- close all editors
- shut down Eclipse
- start Eclipse
- select the file in the Navigator and rename it
Fixed and released to HEAD with corresponding test case.
